answers.answer: Hi there.From what you have described, I believe that a primary vascular or blood vessel problem is in effect.  Blood vessel insufficiency can indeed present with various symptoms.  These can be caused by underlying disorders such as hypertension, diabetes, or high blood cholesterol.  I believe that the blood vessel in your eye affected as well.Treatment would focus on controlling the predisposing conditions such as those I mentioned above.Regards.
